Query.Name: UsrInsert
Query.SQL: INSERT INTO Users (Username, Email, Password, PasswordSalt, AdminInd, Status) Values (%(Username)s, %(Email)s, %(Password)s, %(PasswordSalt)s, %(AdminInd)s, %(Status)s)

Query.Name: ValidatePasswordForUser
Query.SQL: SELECT UserId AS UserId, Email AS Email, Password, PasswordSalt, Username, AdminInd FROM Users WHERE Status = 1 AND Username = %(Username)s

Query.Name: CreateUserSession
Query.SQL: INSERT INTO UsrSession (SessionID, UsrRef, LoginTime) SELECT %(SessionID)s, %(UserId)s, SysDate() FROM Users U WHERE U.UserId = %(UserId2)s AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM UsrSession WHERE UsrRef = U.UserId)

Query.Name: GetUserSession
Query.SQL: SELECT U.UserId AS UserId, U.Email AS Email, U.Username AS Username, 5 As AdminInd FROM Users U, UsrSession US WHERE US.UsrRef = U.UserId AND US.SessionID = %(SessionID)s

Query.Name: GetUserSecurityProfile
Query.SQL: SELECT U.UserId AS UserId, U.Email AS Email, U.Username AS Username, U.AdminInd AS AdminInd FROM Users U WHERE U.UserId = %(UserId)s
